text: Frederik Erdman (13 August 1933 - 10 April 2021) was a Belgian lawyer and politician. He was a member of the Socialist Party. He was born in Antwerp, Belgium. He was a member of the Senate from 1991 until 1999. Erdman was also a member of the Chamber of Representatives from 1999 until 2003. Erdman had a Jewish background. He died in Antwerp, aged 87.Gewezen SP-voorzitter Fred Erdman overleden: “Een politiek icoon”, Het Nieuwsblad, 10 april 2021 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Belgian Jews Category:Belgian lawyers Category:Jewish lawyers Category:Jewish politicians Category:People from Antwerp Category:Socialistische Partij Anders politicians
title: Fred Erdman
